item.title: 12 月央行降息将 2024 年宽松政策推向历史水平
item.description: 各主要央行在 12 月份推出了自 2020 年春季 COVID 降息狂潮以来最大规模的宽松政策，最新举措使 2024 年的年度宽松力度成为 15 年来最大的一次，因为决策者们正在为不稳定的时期做好准备。【原文：Major central banks in December delivered their biggest policy easing push since the spring 2020 COVID rate-cutting frenzy, with the latest moves making the annual 2024 easing effort the biggest in 15 years as policymakers brace for unsteady times.】

item.title: 芯片制造商恩智浦将以 6.25 亿美元收购奥地利 TTTech Auto 公司
item.description: 荷兰计算机芯片制造商恩智浦周二表示，已同意以 6.25 亿美元的价格收购奥地利 TTTech Auto 公司，以加强其汽车业务。【原文：Dutch computer chip maker NXP said on Tuesday it has agreed to buy Austria's TTTech Auto for $625 million, to strengthen its automotive operations.】

item.title: 欧洲股市下跌，医疗保健和金融业受拖累
item.description: 欧洲股市周二下滑，在上一交易日强劲上涨后出现回调，原因是医疗保健股和金融股下跌，同时投资者关注当天晚些时候将公布的欧洲大陆关键通胀数据。【原文：European shares slipped on Tuesday, pulling back after robust gains in the last session, as falling healthcare and financial stocks weighed while investors focussed on key inflation data across the continent due later in the day.】

item.title: 沃尔沃汽车公司 12 月销量下降 3%，电动汽车销量上升
item.description: 沃尔沃汽车公司（Volvo Cars）周二表示，由于混合动力汽车销量下降，该公司 12 月份的汽车销量同比下降了 3%，降至 73 804 辆。【原文：Volvo Cars' sales fell by 3% year-on-year in December to 73,804 cars as the sale of hybrid vehicles declined, the Sweden-based automaker said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 交易受阻后，中国出口推动新日铁在美国和印度寻求增长
item.description: 分析师称，新日铁在竞购美国钢铁公司被白宫否决后，准备扩大其在美国和印度的业务，以寻求增长和免受中国廉价出口产品的影响。【原文：Nippon Steel is poised to expand its operations in the U.S. and India as it hunts for growth and protection from cheap Chinese exports after its bid for U.S. Steel was blocked by the White House, analysts say.】

item.title: 商业游说团体主席称，日本大型企业可能在下一年大幅涨薪
item.description: 日本一家大型商业游说团体的主席周二表示，日本大型企业 2025 年的工资增幅可能会达到 5%左右，与去年持平，同时他承诺将努力把工资增长势头扩大到小型企业。【原文：Large Japanese firms are likely to increase wages by about 5% in 2025, same as last year, the chair of a major business lobby said on Tuesday, while pledging efforts to spread the wage growth momentum to smaller firms.】

item.title: 贸易路线再次洗牌，全球原油出口下滑
item.description: 航运数据显示，2024 年全球原油出口量下降了 2%，这是自 COVID-19 大流行以来的首次下降，原因是需求增长乏力，以及炼油厂和输油管道的变化重新调整了贸易路线。【原文：The volume of global crude exports in 2024 declined 2%, the first fall since the COVID-19 pandemic, shipping data showed, due to weak demand growth and as refinery and pipeline changes reshuffled trade routes.】

item.title: 新兴欧洲的乌克兰企业着眼于向西扩张
item.description: 乌克兰企业正将目光投向波兰以外更广阔的客户群。【原文：Ukrainian businesses are looking beyond Poland to a much bigger pool of customers.】

item.title: 早间竞标欧元区通胀升温
item.description: Vidya Ranganathan 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Vidya Ranganathan】

item.title: 特斯拉供应商松下能源：削减中国供应是美国的 "首要目标
item.description: 特斯拉供应商松下能源公司（Panasonic Energy）的一位高级管理人员告诉路透社记者，该公司计划在美国生产的电动汽车电池供应链中消除对中国的依赖，并将这一转变称为 "首要目标"。【原文：Tesla supplier Panasonic Energy plans to eliminate its supply-chain dependence on China for electric vehicle batteries made in the United States, a senior executive told Reuters, calling the shift a "No.1 objective".】

item.title: 日经新闻》称 KKR 考虑出售日本西友超市
item.description: 据《日经商业日报》周二报道，美国私募股权基金 KKR 正在考虑出售连锁超市西友，交易价值可能达到数千亿日元（约合数十亿美元）。【原文：U.S. private equity fund KKR is considering selling supermarket chain Seiyu in a deal that could worth several hundred billion yen (several billion dollars), the Nikkei business daily reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 马来西亚与新加坡宣布就柔佛经济区达成协议
item.description: 马来西亚和新加坡周二宣布了一项关于在马来西亚南部柔佛州建立经济特区的协议，旨在支持两国之间的投资和货物及人员的自由流动。【原文：Malaysia and Singapore announced on Tuesday an agreement on a special economic zone in the southern Malaysian state of Johor, aiming to support investment and free up movement of goods and people between the countries.】

item.title: 油价跌幅扩大，美元走强和供应前景构成压力
item.description: 周二，油价连续第二个交易日收跌，原因是在上周反弹后出现了技术性回调，而供应充足和美元坚挺的预测也对油价造成了影响。【原文：Oil prices extended losses into a second straight session on Tuesday on technical correction after last week's rally, while forecasts for ample supply and a firm dollar also weighed.】

item.title: 亚洲股市因特朗普关税放宽的前景而上涨
item.description: 亚洲股市周二上涨，追随华尔街的积极走势，一些投资者希望即将上任的美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普在上任后能采取比承诺更温和的关税立场。【原文：Asia shares rose on Tuesday, tracking Wall Street's positive lead and as some investors hoped incoming U.S. President-elect Donald Trump could adopt a less aggressive tariff stance than promised when he takes office.】

item.title: 市场思考特朗普关税问题，美元汇率接近一周低点
item.description: 周二，美元兑主要货币汇率徘徊在一周低点附近，因为交易员们在考虑当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税措施是否会比承诺的力度小。【原文：The U.S. dollar hovered near a one-week low versus major peers on Tuesday as traders considered whether President-elect Donald Trump's tariffs would be less aggressive than promised.】

item.title: CES 在股价创下历史新高后，英伟达首席执行官将在 CES 上发表演讲
item.description: Nvidia 首席执行官黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）将于周一晚些时候在 CES 上发表开幕主题演讲，届时可能会发布新的电子游戏芯片，并详细介绍该公司如何将人工智能领域的成功经验应用到数据中心以外的其他市场。【原文：Nvidia Chief Executive Jensen Huang is set to deliver the opening keynote speech at CES later on Monday and will likely unveil new videogame chips and detail efforts to parlay the company's success in artificial intelligence into other markets outside of the data center.】

item.title: 麦当劳取消总部的一些多元化做法
item.description: 麦当劳在一封致员工和特许经营店主的公开信中称，美国的 "法律环境正在发生变化"，因此将放弃公司领导层多元化的目标，并放弃一些多元化做法。【原文：McDonald's is retiring its goal for diversity in corporate leadership and shifting away from some diversity practices, citing a "shifting legal landscape" in the United States in an open letter sent to employees and franchise owners.】

item.title: 新日铁起诉拜登可为维持美国钢铁交易赢得时间
item.description: 这些公司在周一宣布的一项诉讼中辩称，拜登通过虚假的国家安全审查阻止合并，剥夺了这些公司获得公平程序的权利，违反了宪法。【原文：The companies argued in a lawsuit announced on Monday that Biden violated the Constitution by blocking the merger via a sham national security review that deprived the companies of their right to a fair process.】

item.title: 炼油商菲利普斯 66 计划以 22 亿美元收购 EPIC NGL
item.description: 美国炼油商菲利普斯 66 周一表示，将以 22 亿美元的全现金交易收购 EPIC Y-Grade GP 和 EPIC Y-Grade。【原文：U.S. oil refiner Phillips 66 said on Monday it will acquire EPIC Y-Grade GP and EPIC Y-Grade in an all-cash deal for $2.2 billion.】

item.title: 即将卸任的美国运输主管称波音在 737 MAX 事件后还有更多工作要做
item.description: 2024 年 1 月，阿拉斯加航空公司一架新的 737 MAX 9 飞机在飞行途中，一块缺少四个关键螺栓的门板脱落，即将离任的美国交通部长周一表示，波音公司还有更多工作要做，其改善企业文化的努力尚未完成。【原文：The outgoing U.S. transportation secretary said on Monday that Boeing has more to do and its efforts to improve its culture are unfinished after a door panel missing four key bolts flew off a new Alaska Airlines 737 MAX 9 in mid-air in January 2024.】

item.title: 丰田自动驾驶部门投资北海道太空基础设施公司
item.description: 总部位于日本的太空基础设施公司星际技术公司（Interstellar Technologies）周二表示，该公司已与丰田汽车公司（Toyota Motor Corp.【原文：Japan-based space infrastructure company Interstellar Technologies said on Tuesday that it has reached a strategic capital and business partnership with a Toyota Motor Corp unit.】

item.title: Meta 选举终极格斗锦标赛首席执行官白大拿和另外两人进入董事会
item.description: Meta Platforms 周一表示，该公司已选出三名新董事加入董事会，其中包括终极格斗锦标赛（UFC）首席执行官、美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的密友达纳-怀特（Dana White）。【原文：Meta Platforms said on Monday it had elected three new directors to its board, including Dana White, CEO of Ultimate Fighting Championship (UFC) and close friend of President-elect Donald Trump.】

item.title: 三星第四季度盈利预计将受英伟达人工智能芯片供应延迟影响
item.description: 全球顶级存储芯片制造商三星电子预计将于本周三预测其第四季度利润增长继续放缓，原因是该公司难以跟上英伟达（Nvidia）对人工智能芯片的强劲需求。【原文：Samsung Electronics , the world's top memory chip maker, is expected to forecast on Wednesday its profit growth continued to slow in the fourth quarter as it struggled to keep up with Nvidia's strong demand for AI chips.】

item.title: 埃克森美孚起诉加州总检察长和环保组织
item.description: 法庭记录显示，埃克森美孚周一对加州总检察长罗布-邦塔和几个环保组织提起诉讼。【原文：Exxon Mobil filed a lawsuit on Monday against California Attorney General Rob Bonta and several environmental groups, court records show.】

item.title: 美国劳工机构称，谷歌应被迫与承包商工会谈判
item.description: Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司正面临美国劳工委员会的第二次投诉，该机构周一表示，谷歌是合同工的雇主，必须与他们的工会进行谈判。【原文：Alphabet's Google is facing a second complaint from a U.S. labor board claiming that it is the employer of contract workers and must bargain with their union, the agency said on Monday.】

item.title: 艾伯维因收购支出下调 2024 年利润预期
item.description: 艾伯维周一下调了2024年调整后利润预期，原因是该制药商产生了16亿美元与里程碑付款相关的收购费用以及研发成本。【原文：AbbVie lowered its 2024 adjusted profit forecast on Monday as the drugmaker incurred $1.6 billion in acquisition expenses related to milestone payments as well as research-and-development costs.】

item.title: Ulta Beauty 表示首席执行官戴夫-金贝尔将退休
item.description: Ulta Beauty 周一表示，戴夫-金贝尔（Dave Kimbell）将卸任首席执行官一职，由总裁兼首席运营官凯西娅-斯蒂尔曼（Kecia Steelman）接任。【原文：Ulta Beauty said on Monday Dave Kimbell will retire as CEO and will be succeeded by President and Chief Operating Officer Kecia Steelman.】

item.title: 随着巴尔退出监管岗位，特朗普提前获得了重塑美联储的机会
item.description: 美联储监管副主席迈克尔-巴尔（Michael Barr）周一决定提前辞去监管职务，这是对唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在其第二个总统任期内如何塑造美国中央银行的一个早期考验。【原文：Federal Reserve Vice Chair of Supervision Michael Barr's decision on Monday to resign early from his regulatory oversight role sets up an early test of how Donald Trump will try to shape the U.S. central bank during his second term as president.】

item.title: Ligado 在无线扩张停滞后申请破产
item.description: 无线网络公司 Ligado Networks LLC 周日晚些时候在特拉华州申请破产，寻求削减 78 亿美元的债务，因为美国政府机构阻止了该公司向陆基 5G 无线服务扩张的计划。【原文：Wireless network company Ligado Networks LLC filed for bankruptcy in Delaware late on Sunday, seeking to cut $7.8 billion in debt after U.S. government agencies blocked its planned expansion into land-based 5G wireless services.】
